<title level="1" pfs="">[Ngara](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2241)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 40

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Ngara](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2241)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 99</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +23, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +25, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +25, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +7
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +24 

**Will** +23 

</row>

**HP** 215

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 3d10+8 piercing plus spirit naga venom

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 32, attack +20
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Humanoid Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=153), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Modify Memory](/Spells.aspx?ID=200) (4 slots)
- **5th**
[Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Subconscious Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=314), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) (5 slots)
- **6th**
[Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), [Phantasmal Calamity](/Spells.aspx?ID=218), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) (4 slots)

**Rituals** DC 31

- **2nd**
[Inveigle](/Rituals.aspx?ID=14)

**Spirit Naga Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 32 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d6 poison damage and stupefied 2 (1 round)

</column>
name: Ngara
